title: Denied credit? We may be able to help you rent an apartment home!
posting_body: :-(  You still have to copy-and-paste this link into the address bar on your web browser.
We may be able to help you rent an apartment home!
We specialize in placing people with a hiccup in their credit into nice apartments throughout Michigan.
We offer many communities and apartments you can choose where you want to live.
Prices, sq footage, bedrooms, bathrooms are based on the community you choose with options and ranges to fit most budgets.
Application fee may apply based on apartment community.
Security deposit required for move in plus applicable fees.
Must gross 3x rent per month in income with an acceptable background.
You can click on the video for the viewing of the program.
Please choose a time to schedule your call with a leasing specialist.
Click “Schedule a Viewing (Call)” to speak with a leasing specialist to learn more.
After clicking you will be asked to answer a few questions.
Then confirm the time and schedule call.
